title: Ep128: First Day on the Somme - Gommecourt
itunes:title: Ep128: First Day on the Somme - Gommecourt
description:
To commemorate the anniversary of the start of the Battle of the Somme, Pete and Gary explore the diversionary attack at Gommecourt on July 1, 1916.


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
